column4: Hmm. somehow my windows controlls are on the right side of the window.. but in fact are actually on the left side.  but invissible.
min/maxing the window fixed it.. that was a weird glitz.
to change the button positions: alt-f2 -> gconf-editor -> Apps/Metacity/General ->button_layout
they are changed. :) but its not showing them changed in some windows.
